info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otsego, east central Broome, west central Delaware and southeastern Chenango Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Afton, or 8 miles north of Deposit, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Sanford, Deposit, Bainbridge, Masonville, Unadilla, Afton, Rockdale, Nineveh and Stilesville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 7 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
